CustomField.formula: IF(!ISBLANK(IL_Upfront_Tax_Code__c), IF(TEXT(Upfront_Tax_Method__c) = "GRM", IF(Rental_Amount_Override__c <= 0, Rental_Amount_fml__c, Rental_Amount_Override__c), List_Price__c ), null )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Contains Asset Rental Amount as Infolease Tax Basis if Tax Method is GRM, else tax basis is list price.
CustomField.label: Upfront Tax Basis
